item.title: Europe Is Ready to Make Its First Countermove to Trump Tariffs
item.description: European Union officials will vet and vote on a list of retaliatory tariffs this week, while contemplating what comes next.

item.title: What to Know About the Destructive Spring Storm System
item.description: Heavy rains, damaging winds and dangerous floods have ravaged the South and the Midwest for days, killing at least 18 people.

item.title: Stocks Plunge Worldwide, and Trump Faces Mass Protests
item.description: Plus, Wayne Gretzky’s record finally falls.

item.title: Everything Is Going According to Plan
item.description: Will President Trump’s tariffs go down as one of the 100 worst decisions in presidential history? 50? 10?

item.title: Adrienne Adams Pitches Guaranteed Income as Major Campaign Proposal
item.description: Adrienne Adams, the New York City Council speaker who is running for mayor, will release a plan to provide guaranteed income for homeless families.
